compliant.section: 簡介 – 我們可能對您的個人資料作剖析與自動化決策。
compliant.legal provisions: The right to not be subject to a decision based solely on automated processing, including profiling, which produces legal effects concerning the data subject or similarly significantly affects the data subject.

non_compliant.section: 簡介 – 我們可能對您的個人資料作剖析與自動化決策。
non_compliant.legal provisions: The obligation to provide information to data subjects at the time of data collection, including the purposes of processing and the legal basis for processing.
non_compliant.amend: Include specific information about the purposes of the data analysis and automated decision-making, as well as the legal basis for such processing.
